songs.title: Menace
songs.lyrics:
These rappers claiming
Their  nuts are big
Well  mine are bigger
Watch it  tall boy
You dealing with
A  self-made nigga

A  grave digger
You’ll end up
In  a grave nigga
Body parts rip apart
When you hit with the K’s nigga

Blocc boy I know all the
Tricks  of the trade nigga
Got my money
Now let’s go to war
I’m paid Nigga
I’m gonna do what I want
And so you best do
What you have to
Soon the killer platoon
Of goons coming at you

Blow holes through your body
Leave you stiffer
Than a statue
Cause baby gangsta’s
More nutty
Than a cashew

Sick with it
Cock the 40 cal
Spit with it
Bust my gun
And leave all of you
Dumb niggas nit with it

Squirt the thing slug
Enters and burst your brain
The doctor know I’m off my rocker
I thirst for pain
But calculated tactics
Give you niggas the business
Take your life just for spite
Cause I’m a motherfucking menace

I’m a mothefucking
So don’t push my buttons
I’m a motherfucking menace
I give a fuck about nothing
I’m a motherfucking menace
Nigga if we ever beef
Then you better come with it
Cause i’m in it to win it

I’m a mothefucking
So don’t push my buttons
I’m a motherfucking menace
I give a fuck about nothing
I’m a motherfucking menace
Nigga if we ever beef
Then you better come with it
Cause i’m in it to win it

Second round
Straight a super soaker
Wet you down
One shot body
On the stretcher
I’ll betcha clown

One to the spleen
Hot slug
Burn like gasoline
Marksmen never unload
The whole magazine

One take
One dead body
One wake
And then they gonna
Carry you
To the hole
Where they gonna
Bury you

Family mourn
Completely apart
A family’s torn
While I continue
To hunt the town
Like children of the corn

Through the first slug
Then my bro down
Drew first blood
Living in fear
You had no idea
What the worst was
The worst came
Light your family heads up
And burst em

Massacre took em
All out the world
Like I birth ‘em
One shot from a pump dump
Leave you in a slump
Barrel smoking like
The fine cherry
In my blunt
But calculated tactics
Give you niggas
The business
Take your life out of spite
Cause I’m a motherfucking menace

I’m a mothefucking
So don’t push my buttons
I’m a motherfucking menace
I give a fuck about nothing
I’m a motherfucking menace
Nigga if we ever beef
Then you better come with it
Cause i’m in it to win it

I’m a mothefucking
So don’t push my buttons
I’m a motherfucking menace
I give a fuck about nothing
I’m a motherfucking menace
Nigga if we ever beef
Then you better come with it
Cause i’m in it to win it

Retaliation he coming back
I lay low in the trenches
Clutching a toast
Ease close
Knock out all his senses
Over your shoulders and sober
Block out with the biscuit
Man slain fluid
Leaking fluid brain twisted

Four undercovers take him
And scrape him from the pavement
Going down in the ground
For a hellish enslavement
No statement bail no judge no arraignment
Murder in cold blood
I call it entertainment

It’s heinous
How one can do another
With the stainless
Inflict pain with the thing
And leave a stain
Where his brain is

Started with Cain
I can’t be blamed
Once you release the beast
It just can’t be tamed
Got a taste for blood
When I got my first kill
You do it cause you have to
I do it for the thrill

But calculated tactics
Give you niggas hte business
Take your life for the spite
Cause I’m a motherfucking menace

I’m a mothefucking
So don’t push my buttons
I’m a motherfucking menace
I give a fuck about nothing
I’m a motherfucking menace
Nigga if we ever beef
Then you better come with it
Cause i’m in it to win it

I’m a motherfucking menace
So don’t push my buttons
I’m a motherfucking menace
I give a fuck about nothing
I’m a motherfucking menace
Nigga if we ever beef
Then you better come with it
Cause i’m in it to win it
